missionSuccessStatementOverride: Good job, Commander. Our people are safe and sound.
shortDescription:
Farah is 90% sure that our people have been transported to this re-education facility after their arrests.

Expect a lance protecting the facility with automated defense turrets. We detect several 'Mech signatures few clicks away so expect enemy reinforcement.

Once we secure the base, Sumire will land the Leopard with infantry to secure the facility and transport us and anyone rescued back to Argo
longDescription: We have done this many times before but don't get careless down there.

objectiveList.title: Secure the Area Around the Facility
objectiveList.description: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

dialogueContent.words: Central, I am picking up unknown mech signatures. Requesting the patrol lance to reinforce us.
Seems like we are on the clock... Eliminate the garrison and secury the facility
Once you secure the area, Sumire will land with the infantry to secure the facility and get you all out of there.
The facility is under our controll, Commander. We found our people inn there.
We're ready to pull you out of there.
This is a disaster. I'm calling it; pack it in, Commander.
[GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
[GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
I am coming in hot, clear the landing site!
Warning to the invading mech force - leave the area immediatly! Otherwise you will be faced with the full wrath of CCAF!
Their air assets are being vectored to your position but I don't expect them to show up before we are done here.
Commander, it looks like the Liao local command sent in the reinforcements
